page.title: 10WINLATON'S COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: The WINLATON COMMUNITY CENTRE was built in 1973. It is made of brick and has an odd shape of modern design. There are seven rooms altogether. The main hall, the television room, a shop, a games room, and a small room which is used for a variety of activities.We completed one hundred questionnaires about the community centre. 62% said it was worth having. 55% had used it at some time, 24% used it weekly, 28% used it occasionally and 3% used it monthly. Activities available include the Youth Club, Karate, Gymnastics, Films, Concerts, Badminton and a Playgroup.The centre is also used for blood donor sessions. I think it is worth having because I used to go to the Youth Club.
